website_summaries.verdict: The latest in Samsung technology. From its exceptional motion clarity to wider viewing angles, this Samsung smart TV is clearly the best choice right now.
pros: Distances itself from competitors with a wide variety of inputs and a bright LED backlight for enhanced visibility in low lighting
Quantum technology offers off-the-charts color volume
cons: Expensive, but if you're looking for the best picture quality, it's well worth the investment

customer_reviews.title: Tv mount screw size.
customer_reviews.text: Tv is great. One thing to make note of is if you are planning to mount this tv it calls for a m8-1.25 43-45MM screw. This did not come in the amazon mount box. I’ve hung a lot of tvs so don’t count on it coming with your mount. I purchased mine at Home Depot for $4. Picture of actual screw is above. Per my research the actual length is 43MM and Samsung/amazon sells the screw. 45MM works with a space cap if you’re in a bind.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture!
customer_reviews.text: Researched for a long time. Glad I did not buy a 2018 tv. The 2019 Q70 is full backlit where the 2018 Q7 was not. Very sharp picture. It is a step up from the Q60. I couldn't tell a difference between the 70, 80, and 90. I had a Samsung 52" LED tv before this one. It had a great picture but nothing like this one. Everyone prices this TV at around 2999.00 Costco and Sams advertise this TV with a 5 year manufacturers warranty. I called Samsung and they said this is not true. It has a 1 year manufacturers warranty. Amazon had the best extended warranty I could find. The delivery was trouble free. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Hefty Price
customer_reviews.text: So far I dont think it was worth twice what i paid for my 2014 50" Samsung. The software support...Netflix..Amazon...PS4 type support is much better, but the picture seems sort of dull compared to other tvs I see at times.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏼👍🏽👍🏾👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: I bought a QLED 65” Q60 around Xmas and I was in love. So I knew when I was to upgrade my vacation home tv what I had to get. I went for the Q70 55” this time and I was not let down. The picture is incredible and I paired both of those with a sound bar. I removed my 5.0 surround sound so it cleared up my walls and you don’t sacrifice sound quality it actually is better. Love it and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Think It's Supposed To Do This
customer_reviews.text: Got it all set up only to turn it on and realize the screen was busted. Shipping box was fine. We were extremely care in set up process. Called Amazon. They tell me they can only offer a refund and that I need to ship it. Told them it's big af and I dont have a truck. Scheduled a pick up. Guy came next day, took it despite Frankenstein tape job. 2 days later waiting for refund. Bought one from best buy. Looks amazing. Sound surprised me in a great way. As a gamer, super happy with it. I'm sure many people got theirs fully intact, I did not. if you get it shipped, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Lazarick Green

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot mount this tv to the wall, the set comes with a backing not compatible with any wall mounting devices. You will waste hours trying to figure out why your old mount works and then you will have to send it back when you finally realize that Samsung completely blew it when they designed his POS.
customer_reviews.author: William K. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Brand new TV never worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV a week ago. It never worked. No idea what is exactly wrong, but doesn't turn on. I want it replaced, but neither Samsung not Amazon have done so. Now I have a huge non -working TV and no resolution. They Will refund and send me a different model, not as good. I want the one we bought.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Troianello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a new tv, and was weighing the pros and cons between this and oled, and after reading many reviews watching review comparisons, side by side. I felt qled was a better fit for me. I am also a smartthings smart home user which this fits right in. I havent tweaked anything yet, out of the box the picture looks beautiful. I will do a follow up review after I have some time with it.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints, from Netflix to Steam it all looks great and is very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!  65"  Q70R
customer_reviews.text: This Q70R television is wonderful! I love the picture quality as well as the the sound. I can't find anything negative to say about this set and I hope it lasts for several years. One thing I can say definitely is that Samsung's customer service is excellent if there is a problem. I had purchased another set that developed a vertical line on the screen and they went over and above my expectations to correct the problem. In the end they refunded more than my purchase price so I had no hesitation buying another Samsung product and highly recommend the brand.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: This set fresh from factory a"lemon"
customer_reviews.text: Excited about the new upgraded tv. Arrived today. Set it up and got sound no video. Called Samsung had no clue and their answer was to return to Amazon. So just going to keep my old one for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4k Qled tv
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tv and best tv ever owned. Colors are beautiful and blacks look true black. Ultra 4k and HDR content from YouTube and Amazon look amazing. The tv is very uniform. No light bleed or any other problems I had with other tv's. Black bars when watching movies are true black. So glad I went with the 75 inch also.
customer_reviews.author: erosa

customer_reviews.title: Voice activation is not ready for production
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a Samsung because I wanted a voice activated TV and it was compatible with my other Samsung devices. I have called service multiple times because Bixby voice activation doesn't work properly. They finally sent out service to my home and we got it to work better, but it is very finicky (their term, not mine). Some times it works, sometimes it doesn't. Their voice activation isn't ready for production and needs more development before going into production. It is pretty much useless. Don't buy this TV if you are expecting a voice activated TV. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Price dropped on the TV 1000.00 in less than 4 months after I purchased it on a 5 month payment plan
customer_reviews.text: I really like the picture quality of the TV, but it has turned off and back on by itself while watching Amazon or Netflix several times. I really don't want to return it, but I may have to if it's not something Samsung can fix. It's odd to me that it only has done this while watching Amazon or Netflix. Not Direct TV Price dropped on the TV 1000.00 in less than 4 months after I purchased it on a 5 month payment plan. 699 a month. Amazon should adjust the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D H

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was 100% shocked when I went to power up and the screen was cracked all over!!! - Pics tell the story. NO damage to shipping box or Styrofoam inserts at all. I've ordered LCD's/TV's from Amazon before with no issues. This was an enormous disappointment and I will be picking up a replacement at the local big box to avoid the hassle of returning in the future :(
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy M8 43 mm bolts for wall mounting
customer_reviews.text: Stunning picture. Very bright. Smart picture auto adjusts so well that you really don’t need to mess with fine adjustments. You must buy M8 43 mm bolts to mount this TV on a wall. They are not included. Would be nice if Samsung told you this ahead of time just in case you have a big TV sports weekend you are planning. Ordered the bolts on Amazon and they arrived the next day. As you can see, I got my tv up in time for the Italian GP.
customer_reviews.author: Jake the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Viewing Experience
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great. It was easy to install, but needed several people to put on the furniture stand. The picture is very crisp and clear and works great with the Xfinity remote. We added a sound bar and back speakers after a few days because the room is big and wanted an extra sound boost. Be advised, this TV is very large and would overwhelm a smaller room (ours is about 20' x 20'). We have a lot of windows on the other walls that bring in the afternoon glare. This TV is much better at deflecting the glare than our previous one. We've only had it a week, but we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: High End Value!
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to a high end TV with popping colors and deep blacks that don't degrade a whole lot depending on where you are sitting then don't waste your time on a cheaper TV because unless you went color blind or have not seen what a high end model looks like, you will be disappointed. This TV represents a good value for a high end model which is significantly better than the cheaper LED 4k Samsung TVs.
customer_reviews.author: KnLs2841

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.text: * The TV force you to watch Samsung commercial on your home menu -- unacceptable for a TV I paid for! Everyone should give zero star on any TV that does that! * There is no way to turn off or put on a screen saver while listening to music (for example from Pandora) * The screen is high reflective -- on a dark scene, you are watching yourself watching TV. It's that bad! * ARC does not work. The hardware function of the TV otherwise is excellent, picture is clear, colorful, and have excellent blacks and white. However, that does not overcome the first problem of the TV listed above!
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: So far, beautiful picture. Haven’t as yet figured out how to use the AirPlay feature it claims to have.
customer_reviews.author: Susiewithkids

customer_reviews.title: Don't take the risk, buy it from somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews I saw with TV's being broken, I took the chance and thought whats the chances. Well pretty good I guess. Received it and the packaging was fine, no dents perfect box. The TV was perfect to, until you turn it on. Once it was on it looked like the screen was shattered and kept flickering on and off. Had to return it and buy it from bestbuy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Cracked screen!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to use my new TV except that it came with this big crack in it. How do they care for their products if this is what I open and see. Dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Samsung's usual quality standards.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a 10 year old Samsung 40 inch and sadly, it turned out to be a downgrade in many ways. There's pre-installed bloatware on the TV, and advertising in the main menu which can't be removed. The firestick style remote is awful. The menus are unintuitive. Half of the "smart" features simply don't work (ambient mode, syncing with the Smart Things app, screen casting, etc). And overall, the picture quality on my old 40 inch was far better. The picture rarely looks HD and it frequently jutters, even with the jutter reduction setting set to high. Blacks look washed out after the TV is calibrated in all contrast modes. Honestly, I'd return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Duran Flux

customer_reviews.title: nice pic but view angle is critical
customer_reviews.text: The TV has a very nice picture when looking at it straight on. At even a slight angle the screen begins to look washed out and white. After tinkering endlessly for weeks with advance settings Ive managed to get a decent pic even with a little bit of a viewing angle but its still a very noticeable difference if you move more the 30 degrees or so off center. The blacks are great and fast motion is smooth. Im happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Review is for free scheduled delivery only!
customer_reviews.text: Do not let free scheduled delivery fool you. What a joke! Ordering five days ahead of my scheduled delivery, between 12 to 3 pm. around 3:30 I decided to track my tv. Amazon tracking told me my tv was three states north in New Jersey. After calling customer service to see what the problem could be for over an hour., I was repeatedly transferred to at least four different departments. Two of which must have sensed my frustration, hung up on me. I received two emails stating that they couldn't here me. Well I call BS, do to me being on a landline
customer_reviews.author: kevin mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.  Likely not worth the additional $$
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Samsung TV's and they are great. However, IMO the QLED TV's are not significantly better than the basic UHD sets and certainly not worth the extra $300 to $500. The Samsung smart TV function is outstanding and very easy to jump around between Direct TV, Netflix, ESPN+, Disney+, etc. Also, I purchased this TV as renewed/refurbished and it was practically new TV in box and looked like it had never been touched. Much more palatable to pay $850 rather than $1000.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Dam, It is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Well the first words out of my wife's mouth were Holy$#*% that is too big! But with the unit and in and everything up and running for a month she is very happy with it. The picture is vibrant and clean no ghosting or any issues. The ease of use for the remote took some getting used to but I must say I like the remote. The Apps that the unit runs and the ease of use is great.
customer_reviews.author: Waffle

customer_reviews.title: Sound cuts out when connected to Sonos....but fantastic picture!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tv based on picture quality which is terrific!! However, the sound cuts out at least 20 seconds out of every minute when using the optical output and connected to Sonos Playbar. We are using the same optical cable as used on our previous Samsung/Sonos connection. We purchased a new cable just to be sure. Nothing helps. I’m searching forums for ideas and will update this review if/when I figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: salemoregonite

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: The first one came with 5+ dead pixels spread out across the screen and I could never get it to connect to update as it would timeout (although all the online apps worked), so it wasn't a connection issue. Sent back for a replacement. Replacement came. Only one dead pixel, BUT a black dot (like something stuck behind the screen) right in the middle and the voice part of the remote won't work and it won't control my soundbar. The defective tv before this one the remote-controlled everything. First time trying Samsung. Probably my last.
customer_reviews.author: ATTICUScc04

customer_reviews.title: Can only use this TV if there s no light in the room
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great except for the huge reflections that one can see on the screen from the room around them. If you plan to use this TV in a dark room with no ambient light this will be great otherwise don't waste your money. We could not manage to watch the TV because of the massive reflections were so distracting.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: What a GREAT picture
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TV I think I've ever purchased. 65 inches of amazing. We've been watching it for about 3 months now and the resolution still blows me away. Great interface to switch between streaming services. I cut the cable when I bought this TV and I'm never looking back. Very happy 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: RustyNails

customer_reviews.title: Good TV, horrible Bluetooth device support
customer_reviews.text: Great TV all around. There is really only one very annoying thing about this TV which I hope will get addressed in a later software update- Bluetooth Management. There is no way to manage Bluetooth devices, turn on/off Bluetooth. This may not sound like a big deal to some, but the moment a device attempts to connect to the TV you get a visual indication with a ding on the screen prompting you to allow/reject the connection. All good, unless you have neighbors that have Bluetooth devices that automatically attempts to connect when they see a Bluetooth audio service. You keep getting prompted for each connection attempt, there is no way to blacklist or prevent pop-up from occurring.
customer_reviews.author: Mats

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Not the perfect TV but for the price it was a mega upgrade over my old one. Sometimes I'm unsatisfied with the picture quality but I'm 90% sure it's the source like a commercial that wasn't filmed on good cameras etc. Not a perfect experience but is HD TV perfect? Probably not so maybe it's not the tvs fault. I upgraded from a non HD TV and it's hard getting used to the difference. The vibrance and color and brightness are all amazing. And my video games look perfect which leads me to believe the TV experience is a broadcast issue not my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jonno N.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little worried getting a TV shipped to me, but I’m very happy with it. This was my big Black Friday purchase. For the price, it’s an excellent value. The picture is amazing, it does great for movies and sports, I love the minimalist design. If you have a older tech though like component/avi connections for a DVD player, you’re going to have to get a new DVD player cus this tv only has HDMI ports and USB ports. Easy to set up, easy to configure the picture if you know how, and looks very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Prfine

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT PLAY DTS AUDIO!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT PLAY DTS AUDIO! I wouldn't have spent a grand on a TV in 2019 if I knew it couldn't play downloaded UHD videos. Pretty much every 2160p video you'll download is DTS. Apparently Samsung discontinued allowing it. The video quality is excellent, but it literally mutes the audio and is silent if you try to play a file from your hard drive (my only reason for buying a TV)
customer_reviews.author: Edward Riener

customer_reviews.title: Overall great tv especially at 940
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV especially for the price as well. I returned a Vizio 2019 M series as I was not satisfied with the picture quality and this TV was definitely better the difference was night and day and well worth the extra 300 dollars. One downside is no Dolby vision . And from what I read it cannot do 4K at 60 frames per second however I'm not a gamer so this really wasn't an issue if it is for you you might consider the LG series
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rieder

customer_reviews.title: Buy something nicer like OLED...
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from the picture for almost $800. The sharpness and clarity aren't amazing and there seems to be inconsistent lighting around the top edges of the tv. It feels more like a $500 tv. The other issue is after you turn off the tv with the remote it will turn itself back on about 70% of the time which shows poor quality control from samsung and is a bit annoying. I got this because I was afraid of burn-in with the oled tvs but Id reconsider after living with this picture quality for several months. The audio is good, the only positive.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: HDMI Connectivity Issues known by Samsung - Be warned
customer_reviews.text: HDMI Connectivity Issues known by Samsung - Be warned, this is a known issue by Samsung. The HDMI ports have problems. I connected the Cable Box, and a Samsung Sound Bar, and the TV would not recognize the sound bar no matter what I did. You have to purchase a special HDMI adapter which contains one less wire in it, to bypass the issue.
customer_reviews.author: sweetlex5280

customer_reviews.title: does not onclude mounting hardware!!!!!! warning!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is F'ing ridiculous. Great TV at over$1000 does not include the screw receivers to allow it to be mounted on a wall bracket. I'll never buy Samsung again. I've been on hold with J&J parts, after calling Samsung service, now back to Samsung service. If you plan to hang your TV on a wall, Do Not Buy This TV! I have been on the phone for an hour now. What idiot product manager decided to NOT include a 50 cent part to save money and incur service costs and customer satisfaction?
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and debated between this and the 70/80 models. We are overall very happy with this purchase. The smart features are amazing—lots of built-in apps to the point that we no longer need our Apple TV. The picture and standard sound quality are great, too, but it was easy to integrate our Sony sound bar (and it still works even though we lost that remote!). This is a great quality TV for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best Tv for Movies and Gaming 2019
customer_reviews.text: This Tv is Amazing love the quality and features along with the brights and darks for movies and tv shows . The gaming on this tv is Wonderful. I did a full video review of this product on U tube channel Chas harper. Features and customization you will appreciate on this television. Make sure to get a 90 inch mount .
customer_reviews.author: Chas Harper

customer_reviews.title: Slow and buggy software ruins a great panel
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bad tv just painfuly slow software with plenty of adware. Most apps have a slow response even the built in Samsung ones. Amazon Prime is practicaly unusable at times. I know it is adverising but the remote stinks with not having the colored buttons for the apps, i would rather remove the stupid hulu prime and netflix buttons and replace them with programmable buttins. For the money and expectations this is dissapointing since it is in par with a samsung series 7(half the price) in slownes of the software, but with a more useless remote. First Samsung product I am genuinely disapointed with. The only saving grace is the picture quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Not so smart TV
customer_reviews.text: There is no shortcut to source on the remote - did no one at Samsung realize that in the modern world of multiple inputs that is the FIRST thing you need on a remote? And the sound cuts out daily when you change the station on the cable box. A sound test fixes it, but it's obviously a pain to do this every time - how does Samsung maintain high scores with such poor connectivity?
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Walt's TV is FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: The five star rating is for Walt's TV. This TV had a peculiar sound issue, either with the remote or the TV itself. The TV volume was not adjustable. This problem is reported on multiple Internet sites. If it were not for Walt's TV I would rate this product two star. However, I decided I would prefer to overate the television than underrate Walt's TV therefor the five star rating. Walt's TV customer service could not have been more polite, more responsive nor more intent on solving my new TV problem. Shipments from Walt's arrived in less than two days, return shipment to Walt's was all arranged and paid by Walt's. WALT'S TV...FIVE STARS! This TV/remote from Samsung has issues.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy

customer_reviews.title: A must for Ps4Pro!
customer_reviews.text: >Best TV I've ever owned. >My Ps4Pro looks AMAZING on this bad boi. >HDR is mind blowing. >Game Mode is legit (feels like NO input latency)
customer_reviews.author: Jåden Sylvan

customer_reviews.title: TV is great but user interface is unacceptably bad.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the TV is great. Sound is clearly designed to be upgraded by a soundbar but that's fine. The interface sucks however, they have this dependence on color-coded buttons that need to be accessed through 3 menus to use. Entering text is a tremendous pain in the ass, but you'll find this on any smart TV. I'm absolutely bewildered by the fact that I can attach my phone to this app but it just works as a stupid remote no different from the handheld one included. I really should be able to use my phone keyboard and enter information.
customer_reviews.author: AnomalousEllipse

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY ANY Samsung TV IF YOU USE A TV ANTENNA. NO ADD CHANNELS
customer_reviews.text: If you need to turn the antenna buy a Sony TV. I wish I had my Sony working instead of this JUNK! When I turn the antenna,the TV needs to re-scan to get the new channels and if I turn the antenna back don't have the others anymore and need to re-scan. There is NO ADD channels like on my Sony. EVERY TIME I TURN THE ANTENNA ON THIS POS, I NEED TO RESCAN THE CHANNELS TO UPDATE. This TV does have great sound for not having a soundbar and also has a very good picture. I wish lightning would hit again so I could get a Sony. At least I could add channels if any new ones come along.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all...to say the least!
customer_reviews.text: NEGATIVE 5 stars...just spent a lot of time taking down old and setting up new to find out the screen is busted. Now have to do it all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Much better than budget 4K TVs
customer_reviews.text: The contrast is fabulous and the colors are rich and bright. I had a less expensive 4K LED that was only a few years old and this QLED is so much better. I can't tell the difference between this one and my friend's OLED, which is considerably more expensive. The blacks on this TV are perfect and QLED does not suffer from burn-in, which OLEDs can. Dark movies are particularly enjoyable on this TV compared to my old 4K, where dark scenes were difficult to see. I am really happy Santa brought me this TV. Be sure to pair it with a Samsung sound bar, which integrates perfectly with TV controls.
customer_reviews.author: MARK S FORSYTH

customer_reviews.title: Learn from it has to offer.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new TV it has so many features that I am still learning. Easy set up picture is wonderful, my neighbor is up set that I close my drapes he wants to watch from across the street.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonesgon Customerb

customer_reviews.title: Samsung really needs to fix Bixby.
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture. But watching is constantly interrupted by Bixby. Apparently, Bixby hears something from the program and thinks I am trying to contact it. The sound goes mute and the display says 'Listening" and waits for use input." There doesn't appear to be any way to turn off Bixby, so this happens over and over. It is becoming beyond annoying and at this point I would not recommend this brand of TV to anyone until Samsung addresses the problem. I don't see why someone should be required to use a voice assisted interface if they don't want it.
customer_reviews.author: D & K D

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, good tv.  I had poor luck and had a slightly faulty one
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Though tv has a really weird habit of turning itself back on. Samsungs entire "support" on the matter is restart the tv. Kind of bs to pay $1000+ for a tv and have it do dumb stuff like turn itself back on randomly EDIT-kept having the turning on issues. Samsung sent a tech out who replaced a part and ive not seen the issue since. I was probably just unlucky and got a faulty one
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Qled is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best tv's I've ever owned. Picture is fantastic and the game mode is the real deal. Picked this up on black Friday and have zero regrets. If you are in the market for a new set check this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Biggie!

customer_reviews.title: Still needs to resolve dimming in dark scenes
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of the Samsung QLED TVs. 2 of the Q6 and 1 of the Q7. These have the potential to be 5 stars but there are a few negatives that stop them from being so. The TVs do NOT like going from bright to dim settings. The darker landscape causes them to try to adjust to the low light but they get awkwardly dim and then try to rebalance. But while watching something it’s annoying because you can see it happening in real time, it is not seamless. The Bixby remote is more annoyance than usefulness. It randomly hears something then waits for commands while cutting sound to shows on screen. I’d rather not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous television
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade from a Samsung plasma that had done well for about 10 years. So glad to have the Q70 as a replacement. The picture is stunning. I'd read a few reviews and liked what I read. Shipping was fast. It set up easily. And delivered. I choose settings based on what was listed in another review. Very easy to learn to adjust. Remote is simple and easy to use. So glad to have grabbed this TV while 2019 models are still available. Hope to get another 10 years out of this television.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great colors in 4K HDR gaming and videos
customer_reviews.text: Samsung factory left a nice 10cm red sharpie mark on the screen for me when I unboxed this thing. Once I got it off with 50% IPA/50% RO water it was fine; just dealing with them was like pulling teeth with a channel lock. Besides for dealing with the idiots mentioned above, the TV itself is great and would get 5 stars for picture quality and computing speed. Interface is kinda crappy and I dont like that I can't bookmark my NAS for a quick link when it turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: It's like being at a movie house except I control the volume.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound. If you like watching sports, it's like sitting in the expensive seats. If you watch Hallmark, you'll notice the tear developing in the eye, before it rolls down the cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Phillylover

customer_reviews.title: The cord-cutters TV!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV during the black Friday sales and I have been loving it! My subscription services are right on the remote and it is easy to switch between streaming services and TV input. The color is amazing though you do have to tweak a few settings to make it pop. I know that OLED is out there as an option but with the price-point of this TV and the clarity I don't see that it is worth the extra money to get something that, at best, will be only a negligible improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: I had only one issue
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older Samsung LED tV with this new model. the only issue I had wasw that my old tv was wall mounted and the mounting configuration on the TV was centered. The new one is not centered but is higher than center causing me to have to relocate my wall mount up a few inches in order to have the TV in the same location. Not a major issue but one to be aware of if you are doing the same. All in all, the TV is great.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Quarles

customer_reviews.title: Best Qled Tv
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are better than average. Only thing I don't like is that the local dimming gets annoying when the brightness of the screen flicker to a different brightness, especially with subtitles.Overall, I would highly recommend this (or any other QLED) TV from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Divya A

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out the box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Samsung to replace a 43 inch Vizio (M43-C1) that went black after 4+ years (also Amazon.com purchase). Right out the box the new Samsung had vertical and horizontal lines across the screen. Didn't even bother to continue with set-up. Prime membership is good for 2-day delivery, but returning a defective product I have to use UPS ground and wait until Amazon receives the item, plus wait another 5-7 days afterwards for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon T. Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this TV enough. Exceptional picture. Easy set up. I made sure to order this TV Sold by and Shipped by Amazon and I'm glad I did. Not sure if I got a better than normal tv, but based on what I received, I HIGHLY recommend this TV. Absolutely in love. 82" is the perfect size for my room.
customer_reviews.author: RPatt3

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung smart tv is everything I could have asked for and more. Delivery was a breeze. Delivery was made on the exact date and time I specified.
customer_reviews.author: happy in Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this television! Unboxing it was a breeze. Super easy to set up too. Some of the new larger televisions are pretty flimsy this one is sturdy! The stands are very durable and packaging is great. You will need to help the delivery person as amazon only sends one person to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Thiessen

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Only been a day and a half, but I love it. Still working on the universal remote. Controls the TV fine, controls my Nvidia Shield fine, and it controls the volume on my Yamaha receiver. It does not turn the Yamaha on or off and it does not control my playstation 3.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional picture quality. Vibrant colors and clarity, perfect motion transitions, and the best dark/blackout capabilities I’ve ever seen. Smart features & Apps are easy to navigate, add, remove, rearrange, etc. I’m not sure how it could be much better. I paired it with a proper Samsung sound bar, and it is a better experience than the actual Theatre.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison M.

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased with this clear colorful picture.
customer_reviews.text: The television has a spectacular picture, 4k IS the bomb!! These people whom review/talk about extremely small random issues, watch too much television and study the picture way way too hard. This is a very good, clear and colorful picture. Take it in it entirety, enjoy and dont hunt for things you have read about that the average person does not even see! Liked it so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Godfather

customer_reviews.title: Another Fantastic TV From Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Samsung always seems to impress me with their TVs. This Q70 tv has all the bells and whistles that I could ask for. It shows and amazing picture on all the streaming services, connects to video game systems with ease, and it has a great interface with the google smart home system. Plus the sleek design and thing bezel/frame of the tv makes for a great piece in any living room. Also the ambient mode on the tv is cool when you aren’t watching it. Overall Samsung has done a great job with this tv. All I need now is the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid TV.
customer_reviews.text: A solid performer, but needs some better controls for environments. It might take a while to get used to the controls and to adjust the picture settings to your likening. 4K looks very nice on it, but this is my first 4K TV, I don't have anything else to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: Castolom

customer_reviews.title: So Clear you could jump in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture, sometimes it looks like you are really there. Only problem I have with it is compared to an "OLED" it shows a lot of reflection from light coming thru the windows and table lamps as QLED's are noted for although the brightness makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: K Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best tvs ive seen
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth samsung q series. Important to note there a range if q models. If you are looking fir the very best picture and features Study these levels carefully. If Seeing that something is hd or 1080 p 4k or 8kis your criteria You are wasting your money. A 1080p may have a better picture than A 4k. You need to look at them side by side which is hard to do. In fact i have seen models mislabeled.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Hutto

customer_reviews.title: Not real smart
customer_reviews.text: While the picture quality seems excellent, the internal processor is finicky...particularly when trying to open Amazon Prime..sometimes there is simply no response when trying to access Amazon Prime or the Amazon screen doesn't fill out completely and freezes....a direct comparison with my original Roku equipped Samsung TV verifies that it is not a wifi connection issue and that the problem resides in the TV.
customer_reviews.author: ErikO

customer_reviews.title: Remote goes on by itself sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman so TVS don’t impress me.. but hubby did research and he loves the tv.. I read many reviews that the remote goes on unexpectedly and it is true Imagine in the middle of the night getting woken up to blasting music because it always goes to the Latin music station I don’t know why the remote does that it’s in a drawer when no one touches it
customer_reviews.author: Marie Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Remote isn't perfect, tv is!
customer_reviews.text: I would give 4.85 stars if possible lol. Picture quality, build quality,and delivery were exceptional. TV remote leaves more to be desired but i guess i do love how simple and sleek it is. Overall, if they added just a few extra customizable buttons on the remote, it would be a 100% perfect tv. However, it's still pretty close! Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kurobarahime

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 55” QLED tv
customer_reviews.text: I received this television today, only waiting a little more than a day. Two friendly delivery men carefully carried the tv with a smile from Amazon! I thought we’d have to help but Amazon’s service is the best! My husband very easily connected the tv and it is working with a great picture and no problems!! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Make any room a home theater!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung tv shows up and in under a few moments it is set up and ready to go. This tv fills a room with beautiful picture and a great sound. The smart features are a nice touch as it keep the room clean of all of the extra devices often needed. If we add any more tvs to the home they will be Samsung Q70's!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hyams

customer_reviews.title: Randomly turns back on.
customer_reviews.text: Picture, sound and features are great. Would give it 5 Stars, but the TV randomly turns back on a minute or two after we turn it off. I'm seeing this is a common problem in some other comments. Hoping they'll fix it in a software update at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Take your own chances.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon will only stand behind this product for 30 days so you're on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the sub-55 inch market
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and universal remote. I’ll probably get a single base stand for it. The little aluminum legs don’t allow for swivel and take up a lot of table space. This TV was the best sub-55 inch TV that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeBerry

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed, noticed the intrusive Samsung menu for their apps (I use Roku), insistence on creating an account for their app which I don't want either, then after that saw dead pixels. Reboxed and returned. I'm sure the user experience is common, I really just want a display with a decent processor, with smart aspect dialled way down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't hang
customer_reviews.text: You'd think in the instructions it would either include the right size hanging screws or tell you what size you need! Nope. Gotta guess. All of the screws I have from other installations are not right. Why did they not throw in 4 screws or say what size?!! Zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the (it) for t.v. Nothing else to say.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this t.v. The picture is superb and sounds quality is superb. But the easiest thing about this t.v is the setup. It's a very simple process. Put the legs on, stand it upright, place on your selected table, stand etc. And your done.
customer_reviews.author: ONE 1 ALL

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally crisp TV with a vast color range, a fantastic picture, and the ultimate size screen!
customer_reviews.text: Unreal tv. Picture quality is amazing, especially when streaming 4k content or getting it from your satellite package. I mounted mine with the Q70 sound bar, which I think is a must when getting this tv. It’s huge! Looks amazing when mounted high up on a wall. It’s also very bright so it will do well in rooms with lots of incoming light. The color quality is incredible. The smart features are just like having an appletv built in. I highly recommend the Q70 especially in the 75”.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SUPPORT NO-GAP WALL MOUNTING
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed to find this out after purchasing, all the talk I've seen of these big QLEDs being mounted no-gap you simply can not do that with this TV. Again, super bummed about that.
customer_reviews.author: MDWood1

customer_reviews.title: Very good except....
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is as advertised, it is excellent. Also excellent for a bright room which is where I have it. Two notable negatives- the remote is not useful, there are no number keys, to enter numbers you are scrolling to get to the number. Also the audio menu has the Bass & Treble adjustment grayed out indicating that feature is not available. Whoever heard of a high end TV where you cannot adjust the Bass & Treble levels to your liking?
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture is beautiful. The multiple approvals required during setup was troublesome. You have to agree to give Samsung access to everything. The voice activation for the remote will not work unless you give Samsung the right to monitor you. I didn’t. The channel selector on my remote has never worked. I have had to use my cable company remote. My last three flat screen TV have been Samsung because of the picture quality and no warranty issues. The instructions were minimal. I figured it out by trial and error. I would probably buy again if I could get the remote to work.
customer_reviews.author: PHILLIP T WOLF

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: TV was great for 8 months, then came home, turned it on, could not connect to my network. Tried various troubleshooting ideas - forget/re-add network, unplug tv. After unplugging (while turned off), it came up and began to reboot constantly with horrible lines across the screen!! Samsung is claiming it fell off the wall! (Um now, it sits gently on my floor!) Waiting to see what a technician says...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Vail

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV and great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Everything with this TV is awesome. Picture quality, smart features, and even the sound are all amazing. Samsung could've put a little more thought into the remote design and the Alexa compatibility, though. All in all, this has been a great deal, and I hope to enjoy my TV for a long time to come...
customer_reviews.author: Boris Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my rec room and it is my favorite Samsung yet, this is my 6th. The qled picture quality is noticeably better than standard 4K. The motion rate is great for such a large screen as well football looks crisp. I also like the Netflix, Amazon, and Hulu buttons on the remote. The only slight downfall is how Samsung shows me an ad pushing on demand movies from their store every time I turn the tv on but it only last 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of the most up-to-date features without a big price tag..
customer_reviews.text: The remote is a little different than most as there are far fewer buttons/keys. It took me a while to figure it out. Still can't find out how to fast forward through a movie. UPDATE: Discovered I can use the microphone feature and tell it to 'fast forward' or 'faster forward'. Then you say 'play'....not 'stop'....or it turns off the movie! Pretty neat! The Mic does quite a few things for you and is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.Davall

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with TV purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very please with TV. It was easy to put together and set up was easy as well Fits perfect for area I had in room. Only thing is it has voice command come in middle of viewing when I’m not asking any questions... I want to know how to shout off the voice activation...
customer_reviews.author: CCN 🙏

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant about open box item? Don’t be!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and purchased an “open box item”. I find it hard to believe it was ever opened. It came in perfect/brand new condition and I saved over one thousand dollars. I could not be happier with my purchase and decision to take a chance on the open box item. I was hesitant at first but after this I will be buying this way from now on. Incredible tv! The picture quality and smart features are top notch! I researched for months and landed on this one and it’s just stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Kender B.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable??
customer_reviews.text: The tv has some perplexing, possible problems. The screen has gone completely black, and stayed that way until I pulled the plug and forced a reboot. The tv has turned itself on a couple of times, and has changed channels etc, without anyone touching a button. I am unsure whether the tv or the Tivo is doing this. The Ambient Mode, whatever that is, appears and has to be cleared from the screen, repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Roy J.

customer_reviews.title: Meh! Not so good
customer_reviews.text: They should shoot Baxter which only interrupts at the wrong time and has little skills. Picture is ok, but have had better. I have paired with Roku, which helps, but really prefer TCL (except it breaks down). Guess my next one will be a much more expensive TV
customer_reviews.author: CactusPastor

customer_reviews.title: BEST TV MONEY CAN BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new TV to replace my previous model Samsung and it was everything I expected and more. All features- size, picture quality, connections, controls, and featured apps all met or exceeded my expectations. Samsung continues to produce the best QLED TVs on the market. Thanks to the seller Video & Audio Center for providing me with a seamless shopping experience with on-time delivery, great product, and reasonable pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A

customer_reviews.title: Promptly received product as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. What a picture! Have seen bigger sets that 3- D effect gave me headaches. Uncluttered remote. Yet easy to navigate for additional functions. Often, use TV speaker instead of high end sound bar. Being realistic. A much larger set would be too much for my viewing space.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Winston

customer_reviews.title: Bad jailbars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this tv except the noticable dark bars where the full array zones are located. It is even more noticable in person as my phone tones down the dirty screen effect as well. I have a replacement ordered and will update with the new tv and hopefully less noticable jail bars on the tv. Update replacement tv is here as is night and day compared to the old one the dark banding is very minimal and not noticeable when watching any thing so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Every thing went smoothly on this purchase. The company and then the shipper called me. The delivery was on time and driver was very helpful. TV mounter had no issues. The picture qulity is worth the extra for the Q70 model. Yay!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Big & Good pic
customer_reviews.text: Tv is nice as far as picture quality. The smart features keep telling me to set up the internet then it says connected then you it goes thru it again so not sure what’s going g on. The remote is confusing . Not impressed much with it no number buttons and the talk feature doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a samsung 2018 series 7 uhd this is a big upgrade. Way more contrast, color and brightness. The sound quality is amazing and has plenty of bass, i only have it on the standard setting.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Allen

product_meta.title: Samsung Q70 Series 75-Inch Smart TV, Flat QLED 4K UHD HDR - 2019 Model
product_meta.description:
Size:75-Inch| Style:TV OnlyThe Samsung Q70 Series full array backlighting presents gorgeous blacks and radiant whites within scenes, plus an intelligent 4K processor that upscale the picture and optimizes every scene for an optimal Samsung 4K TV picture.



Powered by Quantum dots, experience 4x the resolution of Full HD 1080p HDTV and over a billion shades of color, enabling you to discover what you've been missing.



The Quantum Processor 4K instantly upscale content to 4K-level picture quality, even from non-native 4K sources, reducing banding, macro-blocking and artifacts often found in compressed streaming content.



To help the Samsung smart TV blend in with your home décor, an ingenious Ambient Mode allows you to customize the screen with meaningful images for a perfectly natural effect, including décor patterns and lighting, info, photos and artwork that match your lifestyle. 



 The Q70 Series include smart features such as OneRemote, Bixby voice command, on-screen universal guide, SmartThings home appliance and device control, smart speaker expandability with Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility, and more.



Power Supply (V)= AC110-120V 50/60Hz and Maximum Power Consumption = 185.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung Q70 Series 75-Inch Smart TV, Flat QLED 4K UHD HDR - 2019 Model, One Remote TM1950C with batteries, Power Cable and User Manual
TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 66" W x 37.8" H x 2.4" D .With Stand 66" W x 41.3" H x 14.2" D. Product Weight – 78.7 lb. Screen Size – 74.5" Measured Diagonally
Mini Wall & VESA (400 x 400) mount compatibility. Dolby Sound and Woofer included, Output (RMS) – 40W & Speaker Type – 2.1CH

Powered by Quantum dots, Samsung’s 4K QLED TV offers over a billion shades of brilliant color and 100% color volume for exceptional depth of detail that will draw you in to the picture for the best 4K TV experience
Inputs/outputs: HDMI – 4. USB – 2. Ethernet (LAN) and Optical Digital Audio Out Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,186 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
